mapper.insert: insert into delivery values(null,#{del.deno},#{del.orid},(select client from salesorder where orid=#{del.orid}),#{del.creator},#{del.createdate},#{del.destination},#{del.deldate},#{del.pickdate},#{del.pickstatus},#{del.poststatus});
mapper.select: select whid,whno,concat(whname,",",(select plname from plant where plant.plid= warehouse.plid)) whname,whaddress from warehouse;
mapper.update: update item set pickstatus=1,pickdate=(select pickdate from delivery where deid=#{item.deid}),pickquantity=quantity,whid=#{item.whid},deid=#{item.deid} where itemid=#{item.itemid};
update salesorder set ifhavedlv=1 where orid=#{orid};
mapper.select: select deid,deno,orid,(select clname from client where clid=delivery.clid) client,(select username from user where uid=creator) creator,createdate from delivery where creator=#{creator} and poststatus=0;
mapper.update: update delivery set poststatus=1 where deid=#{deid};
mapper.select: select deid,deno,orid,(select clname from client where clid=delivery.clid) client,(select username from user where uid=creator) creator,createdate from delivery where creator=#{creator};

select deid,deno,orid,(select clname from client where client.clid=delivery.clid) client,(select username from user where uid=creator) creator,createdate,destination,deldate,pickdate,pickstatus,poststatus from delivery where deid=#{deid};

select itemid,itemno,(select pname from product where pid=item.pid) pname,quantity,deid,(select plname from plant where plid=(select plid from warehouse where whid=item.whid)) plant,(select whname from warehouse where whid=item.whid) warehouse from item where deid=#{deid};
